file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 51-80-02-04 - GROUNDING REC MOUNTING - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL GROUNDING REC MOUNTING - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the Grounding Rec Mounting. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY GROUNDING REC MOUNTING - REMOV- ALL 51-80-02-000-801-A AL GROUNDING REC MOUNTING - INSTAL- ALL 51-80-02-400-801-A LATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 51-80-02 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 51-80-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. GROUNDING REC MOUNTING - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the Grounding Rec Mounting from wing leading edge II LH and RH. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 512 Wing leading edge II - LH 612 Wing leading edge II - RH C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Wing leading edge II H. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the screws (2). (2) Remove the grounding rec mounting (1). (3) Remove the old aerodynamic sealant. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 51-80-02 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Grounding Rec Mounting - Removal/Installation Figure 401 ZONE 512 A ZONE 612 A DET. A B C SEALANT D D 1. GROUNDIND REC MOUNTING DET. B 1 2. SCREW (4) DET. D VIEW. C 1 AERODYNAMIC SEALANT 145AMM570070.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 51-80-02 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 51-80-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. GROUNDING REC MOUNTING - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the Grounding Rec Mounting on wing leading edge II LH and RH. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION CPM 51-21-05 - SRM 51-20-01 - TASK 20-13-21-700-801-A - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 512 Wing leading edge II - LH 612 Wing leading edge II - RH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MIL-PRF-81733 TYPE IV-12 Sealant, PS 595-17857 AR MIL-C-5541 Alodine 1200S AR Commercially available Methyl-etyl-ketone AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Wing leading edge II I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Clean the area with Methyl-etyl-ketone. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 51-80-02 Page 4 of 5 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) If the surface protection of the staking surface is damaged, apply a thin coat of Alodine 1200S (CPM 51-21-05). (3) Install the Grounding Rec Mounting (1). (4) Install the screws (2). Apply a torque of 2.3 to 2.8 N.m (20 to 25 lb.in). (5) Fill the gap between the edges of the Grounding Rec Mounting and the leading edge surface with aerodynamic sealant, according to SRM 51-20-01. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Test the electrical bonding of the LH and RH wing leading edge II ground point (TASK 20-13-21-700-801-A). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 51-80-02 Page 5 of 5 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
